728870.name: Viaerium
728870.description:
Imagine your greatest idea. The one which could make you happy, successful, famous, maybe even rich. Keep this image of your idea in mind. How would it be, to take a journey to fulfill it?
Viaerium is a short, serene story about You, embarking on a path through radiant vistas to make your Idea come true - To reach the enigmatic Council.

Those who are lost must seek Wisdom. Those who seek Wisdom must seek the Council.


  • Vision: Wander through the thought-provoking odyssey to look at your life goals through a different perspective.
  • Tranquility: With outstanding songs by Philipp Weigl and Kai Engel to accompany you through the radiant landscapes of Viaerium.
  • 3D Platforming: Calm journey unfolds with a relaxing third-person movement.
  • Simplicity: Simple controls fit for everyone.
  • No Violence: Take it at your own pace and rules.
